entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High 8.
